content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I have your name please?
Thanks Mary! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Thank you, Mary. Let me just check if we can provide service to your address.
I'm sorry, Mary, but it seems I'm having trouble confirming your address in our service area system. Would you mind confirming if the address is correct or providing any additional details?
Yes, that is the correct address. I'm not sure why it won't go through. Could you help me?

Thank you for confirming, Mary. Unfortunately, since I can’t verify your address in our system right now, I’m unable to proceed with scheduling an appointment. I apologize for the inconvenience. You may want to call us directly to clarify this. If there's anything else I can assist with, please let me know.
reason: Unable to verify address within service area
